software.title: Software
software.description: Keystore file, Private key, Mnemonic phrase

softwareModal.title: Access your Wallet
softwareModal.description: Acquire a hardware wallet for the highest security when accessing your crypto.
softwareModal.notRecommandedDescription:
This is not a recommended way to access your wallet, due to the sensitivity of the information involved.
These options should only be used in offline settings by experienced users.

send.name: Send
send.description: Send LUM directly to another wallet address

delegate.name: Delegate
delegate.description: Delegate LUM to a network validator address

undelegate.name: Undelegate
undelegate.description: Undelegate LUM from a network validator address

getRewards.name: Get Rewards
getRewards.description: Get LUM rewards from a network validator you delegated to

redelegate.name: Redelegate
redelegate.description: Redelegate LUM from one network validator to another
